com.geodrop.SMSOut

Class SMSSend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geodrop.GeodropRequest
      • com.geodrop.SMSOut.SMSSend

  • public class SMSSend
extends GeodropRequest
    Request to send SMS messages specifying a text for the message, a list of recipients and a personalized sender
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    A-Tono s.r.l.

      • SMSSend

        public SMSSend(Vector<String> destMsisdns,
       String messageText,
       String tpoa,
       Date deferred,
       Vector<String> jobnotify,
       Vector<String> dlrnotify,
       Date runrange_ltime,
       Integer runrange_timewindow)
        throws Exception
        Creates a new SMSSend instance
        Parameters:
        destMsisdns - The msisdns
        messageText - The message text
        tpoa - The tpoa
        deferred - The deferred time
        jobnotify - Url for job notification
        dlrnotify - Url for dlr notification
        runrange_ltime - Time from which messages are not sent (HH:MM)
        runrange_timewindow - Number of hours during which messages are not sent
        Throws:
        Exception - If parameters are not valid

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageText

        public String getMessageText()
        Returns:
        The text of the message to send

      • getDestMsisdns

        public Vector<String> getDestMsisdns()
        Returns:
        The vector of msisdns of the recipients; each msisdn is in E.164 format with '+'

      • getTpoa

        public String getTpoa()
        Returns:
        The tpoa used to specify the personalized sender

      • getDeferred

        public Date getDeferred()
        Returns:
        Date and time in the format "Y-m-d H:i:s", used to send the message to a certain date, if not specified the message is sent immediately

      • get_jobnotify

        public Vector<String> get_jobnotify()
        Returns:
        The url for job notification

      • get_dlrnotify

        public Vector<String> get_dlrnotify()
        Returns:
        The url for dlr notification

      • get_runrange_ltime

        public Date get_runrange_ltime()
        Returns:
        The time from which messages are not sent

      • get_runrange_timewindow

        public Integer get_runrange_timewindow()
        Returns:
        The number of hours during which messages are not sent
